Map Check-In Check-Out SETTINGS Enable Location Provider! Go to settings menu? Settings Post Snap Memory Add Photo! Take Photo Choose from Library Snap A Memory\n Click here... Memories Snapped Memories Given To Others 576335102387 Profile Saved Successfully Check-In Successfully Check-Out Successfully Snap Your Memory Successfully Please Check-In First You havn\'t select any image Failed to connect with server Check-In Memory Feed\'s Not Found Snap Memory Not Given To Download Male from United States \n Active member since Octomer 2016 \n 201 Memories Snapped| 21 Memories Given To Others Attention Attention this action needs your permission to run you access the settings? Are you sure you want to exit? Remember Me Our mission is to encourage others to turn the camera around for a moment, and capture a memory of someone else. A memory that would have never been captured without their selfless act.
\n \n Self-Less isn\'t just an app, it\'s a movement. Aimed at getting people to focus more of their attention on what is going on in the world around them. It is about recognizing a moment in someone else\'s life that can never be captured by them from your perspective, and selflessly capturing and sharing it.
